articles.content:
Max Verstappen was told by his race engineer to stay calm as Lewis Hamilton broke the gentleman's agreement that exists between Formula 1 drivers at the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix. 
The incident occurred … [+2086 chars]

articles.title: Qatar World Cup 2022: Prince William reveals he will wear a Wales bucket hat for match against USA - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Prince of Wales sent a good luck message to the team in Welsh, following a row with actor Michael Sheen over him supporting the Three Lions given his title.
articles.content:
Prince William revealed he would be wearing a Wales bucket hat to watch their match against the USA 'in style', as he wished the team good luck in their first World Cup since 1958.

articles.title: Who is Ghanim Al Muftah? The Qatar World Cup opening ceremony star - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ghanim Al Muftah, 20, captivated the world when he appeared on stage with Morgan Freeman at the opening of the World Cup in Qatari.
articles.content:
He is the disabled Qatari YouTube sensation who had a starring role alongside Hollywood A-lister Morgan Freeman at the World Cup's opening ceremony.
